thread.section_title: Viceroy Central Park New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great service
thread.title_full: Great service - Review of Viceroy Central Park New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Pete B
title: Great service
text: We recently came to NYC to get married. The staff were fantastic, always wanting to help even when the lobby was busy. Brian was particularly great in doing everything he could to make our day special. Our room was great with the bed being the highlight ensuring a perfect nights sleep after long days seeing many sights in a truely beautiful city. Would highly recommend for all occasions as the viceroy was perfecly located for all of our needs. Overall, if you book your stay here you wont be disappointed.
